Purpose: To analyze and report snail-specific analyte and total/ specific Immunoglobulin E (IgE) levels in serum, ensuring accurate, reliable, and reproducible results for allergy diagnostics.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., plain red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer with SNAIL and IgE assay kits, calibrators, and controls
